Package org.forgerock.openam.sm

Interface ConnectionConfig

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExternalLdapConfig, ServerGroupConfiguration
    public interface ConnectionConfig
    Represents the details required to establish a Connection to an LDAP server. This configuration is expected to be used with LDAPUtils

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String getBindDN()
      The Bind DN to use for the connection.
      char[] getBindPassword()
      The Bind password to use for the connection.
      int getLdapHeartbeat()
      The timeout in seconds to use for the heartbeat detection in the connection.
      Set<LDAPURL> getLDAPURLs()
      The LDAPURLs that are to be used for the connection.
      int getMaxConnections()
      The maximum number of connections that may be established to the server by the connection pool which corresponds to this configuration.
      boolean isAffinityEnabled()
      Tells whether affinity has been enabled for this connection.

    • Method Detail

      • getLDAPURLs

        Set<LDAPURL> getLDAPURLs()
        The LDAPURLs that are to be used for the connection. This may be more than one to allow for automatic fail-over connections.
        Returns:
        Non null collection with at least one entry present.

      • getBindDN

        String getBindDN()
        The Bind DN to use for the connection.
        Returns:
        Non null.

      • getBindPassword

        char[] getBindPassword()
        The Bind password to use for the connection.
        Returns:
        Non null.

      • getMaxConnections

        int getMaxConnections()
        The maximum number of connections that may be established to the server by the connection pool which corresponds to this configuration.
        Returns:
        A positive number.

      • getLdapHeartbeat

        int getLdapHeartbeat()
        The timeout in seconds to use for the heartbeat detection in the connection.
        Returns:
        -1 if not used, or a positive number.

      • isAffinityEnabled

        boolean isAffinityEnabled()
        Tells whether affinity has been enabled for this connection.
        Returns:
        true if affinity is enabled for this connection.
